  • Class
    Description
    CornerRegion
    class to hold a few details from the creation of corners that help later to match corners.
    CornerRegion.CornerRegionDegneracyException
     
    CorrespondenceList
     
    FeatureComparisonStat
     
    FeatureMatcherSettings
     
    GradientDescriptor
     
    GradientIntegralHistograms
    algorithm based upon paper "Integral Histogram: A Fast Way to Extract Histograms in Cartesian Spaces" by Porikli 2005 Algorithm uses a pattern similar to a summed area table to cumulatively add the content from one lower pixel in x and in y with a runtime complexity that is O(N_pixels), but a space complexity that is O(N_pixels * nBins) where nBins is the number of bins in a histogram (default is 16 for default value range of 0 to 255, inclusive).
    HCPT
    A class holding histograms of a polar theta color space greyscale image and methods to extract features.
    HGS
    A class holding histograms of a greyscale image and methods to extract features.
    HOGRegionsManager
     
    HOGs
    CAVEAT: small amount of testing done, not yet throughly tested.
    HOGsManager
    similar to HOGRegionsManager except that there is only one histogram of each type for all regions.
    HOGUtil
     
    IDescriptor
     
    IntensityFeatureComparisonStats
     
    MatchingSolution
     
    NextCorner<T extends CornerRegion>
    A class to serve the purpose of an adjacency matrix (via rules to choose the "neighbor corner") and the state of "un-visited" for the search algorithm.
    ObjectMatcher
    a class that finds a template object in another image where the object may have changed poses, may have different lighting, or may have different foreground or background.
    ObjectMatcher.Settings
     
    PatchUtil
    carries the current integrated histogram from a region of HOGS, HCPT, or HGS data.
    PhaseCongruencyDetector
    An edge detector that uses principles of phase congruency to create an edge map and orientation and phase angle images - it uses monogenic filters to decrease the runtime.
    PhaseCongruencyDetector2
    Non-monogenic filter phase congruence edge detector.
    PhaseCongruencyParameters
     
    PixelThetaDescriptor
     
    PointSampling
     
    PointValueDistr
     
    PolarThetaIntegralHistograms
    algorithm based upon paper "Integral Histogram: A Fast Way to Extract Histograms in Cartesian Spaces" by Porikli 2005 Algorithm uses a pattern similar to a summed area table to cumulatively add the content from one lower pixel in x and in y with a runtime complexity that is O(N_pixels), but a space complexity that is O(N_pixels * nBins) where nBins is the number of bins in a histogram (default is 16 for default value range of 0 to 255, inclusive).
    RANSACEuclideanSolver
    uses the RANSAC algorithm on combinations of 3 points to calculate euclidean transformations and evaluate them against all points.
    RANSACSolver
    given matched point lists, determine the best epipolar solution using a 7-point epipolar calculation and random draws of 7 points from the matched point lists under the assumption that some of the matched points are not true (correct) matches.
    ShiTomasi
     
    ThetaDescriptor
     
    UnsupervisedTextureFinder
    class to search for textures within the noise extracted from PhaseCongruencyDetector.java.
